pageTitle: UPDATE – Prime Minister’s itinerary for Sunday, June 26, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Munich, Germany

7:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Munich, Germany.

Munich International Airport

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

Elmau, Germany

Private meetings

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, Boris Johnson.                    

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend an official welcome by the Chancellor of Germany, Olaf Scholz.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

12:30 p.m The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 Working Luncheon.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 Official Family Photo and Leaders’ Walk.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 Working Session, entitled Promoting Partnerships for Infrastructure and Investment.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

4:25 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of the European Commission, Ursula von der Leyen.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the launch of the Partnership for Global Infrastructure and Investment.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

5:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of Italy, Mario Draghi.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

5:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of the European Council, Charles Michel.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a working dinner hosted by the Chancellor of Germany, Olaf Scholz.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

The Prime Minister will speak with the President of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelenskyy.
